38.eng-name: The Book of Manners and Etiquette

hadiths.text: This hadith has been reported on the authority of Shu'ba and there is no mention but of the fact about giving the name to the servant and there is no mention of the four expressions (of remembrance) and he did not mention the four words

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ التَّسْمِيَةِ بِالأَسْمَاءِ الْقَبِيحَةِ وَبِنَافِعٍ وَنَحْوِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Use Objectionable Names And Names Such As Nafi' (Beneficial) Etc
